article: ingredients1 1/2 pounds chicken preferably organic1/3 cup coconut flour2 large eggs1 tablespoon almond milk1 cup almond flour1/2 teaspoon salt1/4 teaspoon pepper1/2 teaspoon garlic powder1/2 teaspoon onion powder1/4 teaspoon cayenne optionalinstructionspreheat oven to 425 ° and line a sheet tray with parchment paper . set out 3 shallow , flat-bottomed dishes . this will be your breading the coconut flour in the first the eggs in the second bowl and add the cashew milk . whisk until the almond flour , salt , pepper , garlic , onion , and cayenne in the third bowl . mix until all the seasonings are well one strip at a time , dip it in the coconut flour and make sure it is fully coated .

then dip it in the egg mixture and let any extra drip off . them dip it in the almond flour mixture and make sure it 's fully coated with no wet spots it on the sheet tray and repeat with remaining with pure olive or coconut oil if you have it . this will help them for 10 minutes , then flip them over and bake for 5 more : turn the oven to 500 ° and bake for an additional 5 minutes to brown the outside .
